titles.title: To extend the waiver of limitations with respect to excluding from gross income amounts received by wrongfully incarcerated individuals.
To extend the waiver of limitations with respect to excluding from gross income amounts received by wrongfully incarcerated individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Protecting Americans from Tax Hikes Act of 2015 to extend the waiver of limitations on credits or refunds related to the exclusion from gross income of certain civil damages, restitution, or other monetary awards received by wrongfully incarcerated individuals.
